title: The Fat Frog
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, International, Organic, Western, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Malaysian, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Menu offers a wide range of healthier and vegetarian-friendly dishes, with soups, salads, pasta, and curry. There is also a daily specials board with the day's quiche, salad, and cake. The atmosphere changes through the day, with a casual feel through the breakfast and lunch hours then turning to chilled bali-esque sunset tunes setting the tone for cocktails and beers on the terrace before nightfall and soft uplighting makes dinner a more intimate affair.
streetAddress: 99 East Estate, Jalan Padang Matsirat, Mk Ulu Melaka
